remarks: Elimination of two conditional operators for an implication. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)
statement:
elim2if.1 $e |- ( if ( ph , A , if ( ps , B , C ) ) = A -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
elim2if.2 $e |- ( if ( ph , A , if ( ps , B , C ) ) = B -> ( ch <-> ta ) ) $.
elim2if.3 $e |- ( if ( ph , A , if ( ps , B , C ) ) = C -> ( ch <-> et ) ) $.
elim2ifim.1 $e |- ( ph -> th ) $.
elim2ifim.2 $e |- ( ( -. ph /\ ps ) -> ta ) $.
elim2ifim.3 $e |- ( ( -. ph /\ -. ps ) -> et ) $.
elim2ifim $p |- ch $.
